title: Adaptive Charging is still not working. I thought the February patch would of fixed it but it hasn't
content:
Adaptive Charging is still not working. I thought the February patch would of fixed it but it hasn't.

I set my alarm for 8.15am. I go to bed at 11pm place my Pixel 4a 5G on charge and it states that it is Adaptive Charging and will be fully charged by 8.15am. However when I woke up at 2am it had fully charged already.

Is anyone else experiencing the same issue?

It seems in many forums I'm not the only one.
